_note: All configuration values should be set via environment variables in the .env file
_note2: This file serves as documentation and can optionally contain non-sensitive default values
_note3: Environment variables take precedence over values in this file
_security_warning: NEVER commit sensitive data (private keys, API secrets, wallet addresses) to this file

descriptions.wallet_address: Ethereum wallet address holding LP positions (env: WALLET_ADDRESS)
descriptions.rpc_url: Base Chain RPC endpoint URL (env: RPC_URL) - Bot exclusively uses Base chain
descriptions.vfat_api_url: vfat.io API endpoint for sickle contracts (env: VFAT_API_URL)
descriptions.sickle_contract_address: Address of the sickle contract on Base (env: VFAT_SICKLE_ADDRESS)
descriptions.uniswap_v3_nft_address: Uniswap V3 NFT Position Manager contract address on Base (env: UNISWAP_V3_NFT_ADDRESS)
descriptions.aerodrome_nft_address: Aerodrome NFT Position Manager contract address on Base (env: AERODROME_NFT_ADDRESS)
descriptions.hyperliquid_private_key: Hyperliquid private key for authentication and signing (env: HYPERLIQUID_PRIVATE_KEY) - SENSITIVE
descriptions.hyperliquid_testnet: Use Hyperliquid testnet (true) or mainnet (false) (env: HYPERLIQUID_TESTNET)
descriptions.hedge_symbol: Trading pair symbol on Hyperliquid for hedging (env: HEDGE_SYMBOL)
descriptions.update_interval_seconds: Time between position update cycles (env: UPDATE_INTERVAL_SECONDS)
descriptions.delta_threshold: Maximum acceptable delta before rebalancing in token0 units (env: DELTA_THRESHOLD)
descriptions.rebalance_threshold: Delta change threshold triggering rebalance as fraction (env: REBALANCE_THRESHOLD)
descriptions.max_impermanent_loss: Maximum acceptable IL before action as fraction (env: MAX_IMPERMANENT_LOSS)
descriptions.min_fee_coverage: Minimum ratio of fees to IL required (env: MIN_FEE_COVERAGE)
descriptions.var_confidence: Value at Risk confidence level, 0.95 = 95% (env: VAR_CONFIDENCE)
descriptions.volatility_lookback: Historical volatility lookback period in days (env: VOLATILITY_LOOKBACK)
descriptions.max_position_size: Maximum single hedge position size (env: MAX_POSITION_SIZE)
descriptions.max_position_value: Maximum total position value in USD (env: MAX_POSITION_VALUE)
descriptions.min_order_size: Minimum order size for hedge execution (env: MIN_ORDER_SIZE)
descriptions.slippage_tolerance: Maximum allowed slippage as fraction (env: SLIPPAGE_TOLERANCE)
descriptions.max_daily_trades: Maximum number of hedge trades per day (env: MAX_DAILY_TRADES)
descriptions.close_positions_on_shutdown: Whether to close all hedges on bot shutdown (env: CLOSE_POSITIONS_ON_SHUTDOWN)
